File Beam

A quick application to send any file using Android Beam™

Mohammad Abu-Garbeyyeh
Sorry, your device doesn\'t seem to have an NFC adapter
NFC is currently turned off in Settings, please enable it and try to share the file again
Image depicting the type of the file that is being beamed

CODEwithMOTO is easy to get started.
At the bottom of the screen, you'll see a little pop-up to show you where to navigate to get started. Make sure yout Android device is on the same network as your computer. Then, open a web browser to that address and you'll see a fully-featured editor interface.

This web IDE is connected directly to your application. With it, you can create new projects, edit existing ones, see live console output, view documentation, and more.

CODEwithMOTO makes is simple to create, edit and run projects from your Android device or computer at the same time. Just start the app and build from your mobile, or navigate to the displayed URL to edit via a web IDE.\n\nAre you in?
